name: dungeonyx
description:
you are a Mute. you've been thrown into a dungeon.

a submission to LOWREZJAM 2021

how to play

InputActionWMove forwards/Interact
ALook leftDLook right
Mouse/Left click
Choose option

macOS info: if you're trying to play this on a Mac, you need to run this command:

xattr -dr com.apple.quarantine /path/to/dungeonyx.app

this is because I do not own a Mac to use for exporting and I can't pay to be an official developer which allows signing macOS applications.
